amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds for expansion of catch shares programs in fisheries along the Atlantic seaboard and the Gulf of Mexico.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 548 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds for any fishery under the jurisdiction of the South Atlantic, Mid-Atlantic, New England, or Gulf of Mexico Fishery Management Council.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jones amendment (A142) Agreed to by recorded vote: 259 - 159 (Roll no. 130).
